src/lib/components/RadioImages.react.js.description:
RadioItems is a component that encapsulates several radio item inputs.
The values and labels of the RadioItems is specified in the `options`
property and the seleced item is specified with the `value` property.
Each radio item is rendered as an input and associated label which are
siblings of each other.

id.description:
The ID of this component, used to identify dash components in callbacks.
The ID needs to be unique across all of the components in an app.

key.description:
A unique identifier for the component, used to improve
performance by React.js while rendering components
See https://reactjs.org/docs/lists-and-keys.html for more info

value.name: union
value.description:
The value of the radio item. This value corresponds to the items
specified in the `value` property.

disabled.name: bool
disabled.description: If true, this radio item is disabled and can't be clicked on.

input_id.name: string
input_id.description:
id for this option's input, can be used to attach tooltips or apply
CSS styles

label_id.name: string
label_id.description:
id for this option's label, can be used to attach tooltips or apply
CSS styles

className.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `class_name` instead.

The class of the container (div)

input_style.description: The style of the <input> radio element

inputStyle.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `input_style` instead.

The style of the <input> radio element

input_checked_style.description:
Additional inline style arguments to apply to <input> elements on checked
items.

inputCheckedStyle.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `input_checked_style` instead.

Additional inline style arguments to apply to <input> elements on checked
items.

input_class_name.description: The class of the <input> radio element

inputClassName.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `input_class_name` instead.

The class of the <input> radio element

input_checked_class_name.description:
Additional CSS classes to apply to the <input> element when the
corresponding radio is checked.

inputCheckedClassName.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `input_checked_class_name` instead.

Additional CSS classes to apply to the <input> element when the
corresponding radio is checked.

label_style.description: Inline style arguments to apply to the <label> element for each item.

labelStyle.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `label_style` instead.

Inline style arguments to apply to the <label> element for each item.

label_checked_style.description:
Additional inline style arguments to apply to <label> elements on checked
items.

labelCheckedStyle.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `label_checked_style` instead.

Additional inline style arguments to apply to <label> elements on checked
items.

label_class_name.description: CSS classes to apply to the <label> element for each item.

labelClassName.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `label_class_name` instead.

CSS classes to apply to the <label> element for each item.

label_checked_class_name.description:
Additional CSS classes to apply to the <label> element when the
corresponding radio is checked.

labelCheckedClassName.description:
**DEPRECATED** Use `label_checked_class_name` instead.

Additional CSS classes to apply to the <label> element when the
corresponding radio is checked.

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback that gets fired when the value changes.

image_class_name.description: CSS classes to apply to the element for each item.

card_class_name.description: CSS classes to apply to the <card> element for each item.

is_loading.name: bool
is_loading.description: Determines if the component is loading or not

component_name.name: string
component_name.description: Holds the name of the component that is loading

loading_state.description: Object that holds the loading state object coming from dash-renderer

persistence.description:
Used to allow user interactions in this component to be persisted when
the component - or the page - is refreshed. If `persisted` is truthy and
hasn't changed from its previous value, a `value` that the user has
changed while using the app will keep that change, as long as
the new `value` also matches what was given originally.
Used in conjunction with `persistence_type`.

persisted_props.description:
Properties whose user interactions will persist after refreshing the
component or the page. Since only `value` is allowed this prop can
normally be ignored.

persistence_type.description:
Where persisted user changes will be stored:
memory: only kept in memory, reset on page refresh.
local: window.localStorage, data is kept after the browser quit.
session: window.sessionStorage, data is cleared once the browser quit.

name.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.
